## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d63b5bacf693f4e1797b1d80dc8abff1ac77c59101018141811201201aa55c77)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'shadokv' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
